ksp controller joy stick

I have just installed and binded things from my controller to things on ksp. But I have one problem, that is that the two joy sticks that move at the bottom, I cant figure out how to bind to something. Is it even possible? if not what will I need. Thanks for the help

First off, you're posting in the wrong subforum. Please consider carefully where you place new threads, Rule 2.4 is in effect.

Second, as a new poster you have to wait for moderators to clear your posts, please do not attempt to post several times, instead wait patiently for your thread to appear.

Thread moved.
